name: iPhone 14 Pro
description: The iPhone 14 Pro delivers a premium smartphone experience with powerful performance, stunning display, and advanced camera system.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra is a flagship Android smartphone with an AMOLED display and 200MP camera, perfect for power users.

name: Xiaomi 13 Pro
description: Xiaomi 13 Pro offers flagship-level performance at a competitive price with Leica-powered camera and AMOLED display.

name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: Google Pixel 8 Pro is designed for users who want the best Android experience directly from Google with AI-powered features.

name: OnePlus 11
description: OnePlus 11 offers flagship-level speed and performance with a smooth AMOLED display, high refresh rate, and fast charging. Ideal for gamers and performance enthusiasts.

name: Realme GT 3
description: Realme GT 3 is a budget-friendly flagship smartphone with great performance, AMOLED display, and large battery, perfect for daily use and entertainment.
